item.title: 将GNU代入Windows！
item.description: 下载 https://github.com/bmatzelle/gow/releases/download/v0.8.0/Gow-0.8.0.exe 正如项目介绍所说： Gow – The lightweight alternative to Cygwin Win32 Utilities Overview Below are just a few of the 100+ applications found in Gow. Shell scripting: bash, zsh Compression: gzip, zip, bzip2, compress SSH: putty, psftp, pscp, pageant, plink Download/upload: cURL, wget FTP: NcFTP Editing: vim, nano Text search/view: grep, agrep, less, cat, tail, head File system: mv, cp, du,
